review: I bought this in order to MLBTV streaming. There is a serious problem with the app that makes it unwatchable because of constant buffering. Neither Amazon nor MLB have dealt with the issue.  Otherwise the performance is good and I do not have similar problems with any other apps. It's well worth the money unless you want to watch baseball.

I also own the fire box and it that is even better and more powerful, Amazon has finally made a product worth buying over and over again.
